website_summaries.verdict: These comfortable shoes are great for everyday wear and can easily be dressed up or down.
pros: Comes in black full grain, light brown full grain, light gold metallic, navy and taupe full grain
Full grain leather or metallic leather upper
Leather lining, cushioned footbed, rubber outsole
cons: Elastic strap may loosen over time, changing the fit

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, stylish walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a recent trip to Europe to walk around in. Super comfy foot bed (it is cushy), and fit perfectly. The back strap over my heel is not super tight so it doesn't dig in or give you blisters. The stretchy X straps keep your foot snuggly in the shoe without being too tight. I was able to dress these up in the evening with a sun dress, and wear them with shorts and a T-shirt, so they're quite versatile. I also liked that they had a rubber bottom with tread so you don't slip/slide if the ground is wet. Great shoe, and seems like it will hold up well and is well made, too.
customer_reviews.author: aimlynn

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals but beware the elastic strap!
customer_reviews.text: I'm crazy about all my Born shoes and sandals. The footbed is excellent. This pair lost one star because the cross over strap is of elastic which does tend to stretch and make the fit sloppier as time goes on. I doubt this can be remedied but I will ask my cobbler to try when it is impossible to wear these sandals thanks to fit.
customer_reviews.author: MARILYN

customer_reviews.title: 5 and it fits perfect. The 7 would have been too big
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 6 instead of my usual 6.5 and it fits perfect. The 7 would have been too big. They are good for beach days, great for walking, no break-in time and absolutely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lorenchen

customer_reviews.title: Good daily sandal
customer_reviews.text: I’ve really liked these shoes for the past few months, although now they make a noise about 90% of the time while walking in them. It sounds a bit like there’s air in the soles. I was nervous about the elastic straps becoming too worn, but so far a summer of near daily wear, even while hiking and getting wet, they seem to be holding up nicely. I don’t expect them to last me more than two summers, but for the price they’re great.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Bellizzi

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, fits nicely. The only thing I would change is the sole. A sturdier sole would make this a 5 star shoe.
customer_reviews.author: cuppotea3

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a comfortable navy sandal for a while, and was so happy to find this Born shoe. It is so cute on, with the navy and denim straps. The fit is true to size, I wear a 7. I need a sandal with some arch support, and this is just right. Love this right out of the box!
customer_reviews.author: Carole Bishop

customer_reviews.title: I really like them. I already had a pair in navy ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like them. I already had a pair in navy and these are just as I expected them to be. Happy with the color which is sometimes different than what is seen on the screen.
customer_reviews.author: LOM

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable travel shoes
customer_reviews.text: Some of the most comfortable walking sandals I have ever owned. I travelled around Portugal for a week in my feet all day with no rub. Also nice looking. Beware they are not good in the rain though, they soak up water.
customer_reviews.author: Prince

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This brand it's full grain leather. So comfortable I can have all day
customer_reviews.author: Luisa M Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Comfort all day
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable fit, great color goes with most outfits casual of dressy. My feet did tend to sweat a bit after standing in them all day in a teaching environment, but felt great at end of day comfort wise. I wish I could get in other colors in my size.
customer_reviews.author: SD KT

customer_reviews.title: Walk in comfort and style.
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Very comfortable, can walk anywhere. Wish they came in some brighter colors.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Carol Sheets

customer_reviews.title: Goes great with denim.
customer_reviews.text: I loved these sandals the first time I saw them. It has been hard to find a nice blue sandal. They look GREAT with denim. They are very comfortable, stylish and light weight. I have gotten several complements on them which always makes me happy!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn M.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in quality
customer_reviews.text: Elastic came unstitched from leather and then unraveled after only a few wearing. Very disappointed in this purchase. My other Born shoes held up great, but not this pair.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda S Hertel

customer_reviews.title: Terrific summer sandals
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They're quite comfortable, which you'd expect from Born, and fit well with my summer wardrobe. Great price, too.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. Fellman

customer_reviews.title: Fit....The black were a little too wide for me while the other colors were fine
customer_reviews.text: While the Navy Blue and Tan in this sandal fit great the gold and black were too big.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Stretches out quickly
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit well when I received them and they’re cute and comfy but I’ve only been wearing them a couple weeks now and the ankle straps don’t fit anymore. They have gotten stretched out and slide down my ankle constantly now.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and attractive sandal
customer_reviews.text: This Born sandal is quite comfortable although initially, the straps felt a little too snug. They naturally loosen up over time. The sandal is a nice neutral palette that goes with everything and you can walk over all sorts of terrain and it stays on your foot.
customer_reviews.author: CaliKoko

customer_reviews.title: Best sandals ever!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could wear these year-round. Walked SO much on vacation but these kept my feet cool and healthy. No blisters!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Proctor

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love these. So comfortable. Walked around Austria for an entire week in them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Sandal
customer_reviews.text: I tried these on a store and they were comfy. I just bought these. I tried them on, still comfy, but one sandal felt bigger. It felt stretched out like someone tried it on. It was the one without the padding to keep its shaping, so maybe a returned pair. So, I ordered another pair. Hopefully new pair will fit properly on both feet
customer_reviews.author: Monica C.

customer_reviews.title: Straps stretch out
customer_reviews.text: Sandal itself is comfortable, it was great until the straps got worn in and no longer stay in place. I was expecting them to last longer. They now flop awkwardly off my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Vlinder

product_meta.title: BORN - Womens - Atiana
product_meta.description: Elastic straps and a rugged tread outfit a versatile active sandal
